text: dharmaya himi ayavaḷuni! ibrāhīm gæna (ohu yudevveku vaśayen hō nætahot kristiyānuveku vaśayen hō siṭiyehiya yayi) kumak nisā nikaruṇē tarka karamin siṭinnēda? (yudevvangē dharmaya vana) tavrātayada, (kristiyānuvangē dharmaya vana) injīlda ohugen itāmat dīrgha kālayakaṭa) pasuvama pahaḷa viya. (metaram dæyakvat) oba dæna gata yutu novēda
